com.artemis.systems

Class VoidEntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.EntitySystem
      • com.artemis.systems.VoidEntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityObserver

    public abstract class VoidEntitySystem
extends EntitySystem
    This system has an empty aspect so it processes no entities, but it still gets invoked.

    You can use this system if you need to execute some game logic and not have to concern yourself about aspects or entities.

    Author:
    Arni Arent
